Class TablePrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.borg.ui.util.TablePrinter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Printable

    public class TablePrinter
extends Object
implements Printable
    wraps a JTable in a class to make it Printable. contains a methos to send the JTable to a printer
